description:
Yuu keeps telling herself there’s no way she’s joining the student council. Touko wants to stop by a bookstore on her way home and is in for a surprise.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Mada Taikiken / Watashi o Suki na Hito
Still up in the Air / The One Who Likes Me
Toujours sur terre / Celle qui m`aime
まだ大気圏 / わたしを好きな人
